message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
You're being too generous, let's try for more!
You're trying to take advantage of me, Bob! Let's meet in the middle.
You're still being too generous, let's get closer to 50/50!
You're not getting any more generous, Bob. I'll meet you halfway, but no further!
I'll give you a little less, but I'm still not going to give up on getting the majority!
It's getting late, Bob. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.
